name: you need bones.
description:
you need bones. is a short Twine game about bones and the need of them. The game is roughly 8k words and it shouldn't take more than a few minutes to complete a playthrough.

---

Content Warnings: 

  • Violence
  • Descriptions of gore and animal death
  • Discussion of eye horror
  • Insects

There are no images, audio, or jumpscares.
